feedback:
Limited DRIVER framework demonstration. Focus on these missing stages: E, R, V, R2.


AREAS FOR IMPROVEMENT:
- Financial APP: The submission contains only reports of a technical failure and unsuccessful IT contact, with no demonstration that the tool performs any financial tasks or examples of financial functionality. Because there is no evidence of a working financial application or conceptual treatment of financial features, the criterion is not met.
- Integrate AI: The submission contains no mention or demonstration of AI capabilities being used or integrated; it only documents a technical access problem and outreach to IT. Because there is no evidence that AI was employed to add value or address the task, the criterion is not met.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "Kaltura was not working and I was unable to download the video or transcript."
"reached out to IT and got no response."
"reached out to IT and got no response."
criteria.driver_alignment: DISCOVER: Student identified the access problem ("Kaltura was not working...").
criteria.reasoning: The submission contains only reports of a technical failure and unsuccessful IT contact, with no demonstration that the tool performs any financial tasks or examples of financial functionality. Because there is no evidence of a working financial application or conceptual treatment of financial features, the criterion is not met.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "Kaltura was not working and I was unable to download the video or transcript."
"reached out to IT and got no response."
"Kaltura was not working and I was unable to download the video or transcript. reached out to IT and got no response."
criteria.driver_alignment: Discover: student identified a technical issue (Kaltura failure). Implement: student attempted to resolve by contacting IT but received no response. Neither stage shows any AI exploration, use, or integration.
criteria.reasoning: The submission contains no mention or demonstration of AI capabilities being used or integrated; it only documents a technical access problem and outreach to IT. Because there is no evidence that AI was employed to add value or address the task, the criterion is not met.
